thread.title: Galaxy sign former Quakes GK JT Marcinkowski
thread.title_full: Galaxy sign former Quakes GK JT Marcinkowski

author: Field Level Media
title: Galaxy sign former Quakes GK JT Marcinkowski
text:
The LA Galaxy announced the signing of free agent goalkeeper JT Marcinkowski on Thursday.
The 27-year-old American is under contract through 2026 with an option for 2027.
...HIGH FIRE DANGER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST AND EAST GEORGIA DUE TO LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES... Relative humidities at or below 30 percent and westerly wind gusts up to 35 mph can be expected for around 4 hours this afternoon and evening north of Interstate 20. South of Interstate 20 relative humidities below 25 percent and westerly wind gusts near 25 mph are anticipated for around 4 hours this afternoon and evening. With relatively dry fuels, high fire danger conditions can be expected. Please refer to your local burn permitting authorities whether you may burn outdoors. If you do burn outside, use extreme caution.
